Resources.Source: or
Resources.Translation: ali

Resources.Source: Not selected
Resources.Translation: Ni izbrano

Resources.Source: Choose a file to attach:
Resources.Translation: Izberite datoteko, ki jo želite priložiti:

Resources.Source: The form field, {0}, is missing.
Resources.Translation: Polje obrazca <{0}> manjka.

Resources.Source: Correct answer
Resources.Translation: Pravilen odgovor

Resources.Source: A requested file could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevane datoteke ni bilo mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: No file attached.
Resources.Translation: Priložena ni nobena datoteka.

Resources.Source: Incorrect answer
Resources.Translation: Nepravilen odgovor

Resources.Source: Incorrect answer
Resources.Translation: Nepravilen odgovor

Resources.Source: Detach File
Resources.Translation: Odpni datoteko

Resources.Source: A requested file attachment could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevane datotečne priloge ni bilo mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: View File
Resources.Translation: Ogled datoteke

Resources.Source: Browse...
Resources.Translation: Prebrskaj ...

Resources.Source: The type attribute has an invalid value in the assessment markup: {0}
Resources.Translation: Atribut tipa ima neveljavno vrednost v označenem besedilu za oceno: {0}

Resources.Source: Instructor comments:
Resources.Translation: Komentarji predavatelja:

Resources.Source: <Unanswered>
Resources.Translation: <Neodgovorjeno>

Resources.Source: "The text entered is formatted incorrectly or greater than the maximum {0} characters."
Resources.Translation: »Vneseno besedilo je oblikovano nepravilno ali pa je daljše od največjega dovoljenega števila znakov – {0}.«

Resources.Source: The posted <option> value, {0}, is out of range for the <select> tag with name="{1}".
Resources.Translation: Objavljena vrednost elementa <option> {0}, je za oznako <select> z imenom »{1}« izven obsega.

Resources.Source: Correct answer
Resources.Translation: Pravilen odgovor

Resources.Source: View the attached file.
Resources.Translation: Oglejte si priloženo datoteko.

Resources.Source: The value, {0}, of the form field, {1}, is invalid.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost {0} polja obrazca {1} ni veljavno.

Resources.Source: "The score entered is formatted incorrectly or outside the allowable range of -1000 to 1000."
Resources.Translation: »Vneseni rezultat je oblikovan nepravilno ali pa je izven dovoljenega obsega od -1000 do 1000«.

Resources.Source: Correct answer:
Resources.Translation: Pravilen odgovor:

Resources.Source: Selected
Resources.Translation: Izbrano

Resources.Source: This is the correct answer but it was not selected
Resources.Translation: To je pravilen odgovor, vendar ni bil izbran

Resources.Source: There is an attached {0} file.
Resources.Translation: Priložena je datoteka {0}.

Resources.Source: Replace the attached file with another file:
Resources.Translation: Zamenjajte priloženo datoteko z drugo:

Resources.Source: The value of the id is invalid in the assessment markup: {0}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost id-ja v označenem besedilu za oceno ni veljavna: {0}

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that exceeded the supported length.
Resources.Translation: Elementu podatkovnega modela »{0}« je bila posredovana vrednost, ki presega podprto dolžino.

Resources.Source: The package compression format is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Oblika stiskanja paketa ni podprta.

Resources.Source: Sequencing is flowing to activity '{0}'.
Resources.Translation: Zaporedje se nadaljuje proti dejavnosti »{0}«.

Resources.Source: The .zip file cannot be found.
Resources.Translation: Datoteke .zip ni mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: The value cannot be set to null.
Resources.Translation: Vrednosti ni mogoče nastaviti na ničelno vrednost.

Resources.Source: A parameter contains an empty string, which is not allowed.
Resources.Translation: Parameter vsebuje prazen niz, kar ni dovoljeno.

Resources.Source: The requested item, {0}, can not be accessed.
Resources.Translation: Dostop do zahtevanega elementa {0} ni mogoč.

Resources.Source: No unique identifiers are defined for items in this list.
Resources.Translation: Za elemente na tem seznamu ni definiran noben enoličen identifikator.

Resources.Source: Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev pri izbiri izhoda iz nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja.

Resources.Source: No activities to consider.
Resources.Translation: Ni dejavnosti za pregled.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost ni definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se ni začela.

Resources.Source: A suspended activity is not defined.
Resources.Translation: Začasno zaustavljena dejavnost ni definirana.

Resources.Source: A current activity is already defined. The sequencing session has already begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost je že definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se je že začela.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nobena dejavnost ni »prejšnja« korenu.

Resources.Source: Unsupported navigation request.
Resources.Translation: Nepodprta zahteva za krmarjenje.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja poteka.

Resources.Source: Flow or Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja poteka ali samo posredovanja.

Resources.Source: Rollup aborted because child activity '{0}' does not have a primary objective.
Resources.Translation: Zbiranje je bilo prekinjeno, ker podrejena dejavnost »{0}« nima primarnega cilja.

Resources.Source: RetryAll
Resources.Translation: RetryAll

Resources.Source: Identified activity is already active.
Resources.Translation: Prepoznana dejavnost je že aktivna.

Resources.Source: Read error.
Resources.Translation: Napaka pri branju.

Resources.Source: Activity '{0}' skipped because its pre-condition Skip rules evaluated as true.
Resources.Translation: Dejavnost »{0}« je preskočena, ker so bila njena predpogojna pravila za preskok ovrednotena kot resnična.

Resources.Source: The ZipPackageReader has encountered an error and cannot continue.
Resources.Translation: ZipPackageReader je naletel na napako in ne more nadaljevati.

Resources.Source: The item specified is already added to this or another list belonging to this data model.
Resources.Translation: Naveden element je že dodan temu ali drugemu seznamu, ki pripada temu podatkovnemu modelu.

Resources.Source: Rollup initiated for activity '{0}'.
Resources.Translation: Zbiranje za dejavnost »{0}« se je začelo.

Resources.Source: The entry point of the current activity is not contained within this package.
Resources.Translation: Vstopna točka trenutne dejavnosti ni vsebovana v tem paketu.

Resources.Source: Retry
Resources.Translation: Retry

Resources.Source: End of stream reached.
Resources.Translation: Dosežen je bil konec toka.

Resources.Source: A required identifier was not provided for this element.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevan identifikator za ta element ni bil priskrbljen.

Resources.Source: ExitAll
Resources.Translation: ExitAll

Resources.Source: Stream must have read and seek capability.
Resources.Translation: Tok mora imeti zmožnosti branja in iskanja.

Resources.Source: The key specified '{0}' does not match the identifier within the item to be added to the dictionary '{1}'.
Resources.Translation: Naveden ključ »{0}« se ne ujema z identifikatorjem znotraj elementa, ki naj bi bil dodan v slovar »{1}«.

Resources.Source: Sequencing Post Condition rule on activity '{0}' resulted in a {1} request.
Resources.Translation: Pravilo za pogoje po sekvencioniranju za dejavnost »{0}« je vrnilo zahtevo {1}.

Resources.Source: The value cannot be set to an empty or null string.
Resources.Translation: Vrednosti ni mogoče nastaviti na prazen ali ničelni niz.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to reactivate the current session. Only a completed or abandoned session may be reactivated, and only in RandomAccess view.
Resources.Translation: Vnovično aktiviranje trenutne seje ni veljavno. Znova je mogoče aktivirati samo dokončano ali zapuščeno sejo, in to samo v pogledu RandomAccess.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to exit the current session. Only a session that has started may be exited, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Izhod iz trenutne seje ni veljaven. Mogoč je samo izhod iz seje, ki se je že začela, in to samo v pogledu Execute.

Resources.Source: Cannot remove or replace the primary objective.
Resources.Translation: Primarnega cilja ni mogoče odstraniti ali zamenjati.

Resources.Source: A CurrentActivity that is active is required to exist before requesting this operation.
Resources.Translation: Aktivna dejavnost CurrentActivity mora obstajati pred oddajo zahteve za to operacijo.

Resources.Source: Cannot change the identifier if an item in a dictionary. Try removing the item, changing the identifier, then re-adding it.
Resources.Translation: Identifikatorja ni mogoče spremeniti, če je element v slovarju. Poskusite odstraniti element, spremeniti identifikator in element dodati znova.

Resources.Source: The '{0}' data model element is only valid in SCORM 2004 packages.
Resources.Translation: Element podatkovnega modela »{0}« je veljaven samo v paketih SCORM 2004.

Resources.Source: The '{0}' data model element is only valid in SCORM 1.2 packages.
Resources.Translation: Element podatkovnega modela »{0}« je veljaven samo v paketih SCORM 1.2.

Resources.Source: The index is out of range.
Resources.Translation: Indeks je izven obsega.

Resources.Source: ExitParent
Resources.Translation: ExitParent

Resources.Source: The current activity in the session defines an entry point that does not exist in the package. The content cannot be read.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost v seji definira vstopno točko, ki v paketu ne obstaja. Vsebine ni mogoče prebrati.

Resources.Source: An object created for use by a different data model cannot be added to this data model.
Resources.Translation: Predmeta, ki je bil ustvarjen za uporabo z drugim podatkovnim modelom, ni mogoče dodati temu podatkovnemu modelu.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to resume the current session. Only a suspended session may be resumed, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Nadaljevanje trenutne seje ni veljavno. Mogoče je samo nadaljevanje začasno zaustavljene seje, in to samo v pogledu Execute.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to suspend the current session. Only an active session may be suspended, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Začasna zaustavitev trenutne seje ni veljavna. Mogoča je samo začasna zaustavitev aktivne seje, in to samo v pogledu Execute.

Resources.Source: The package is missing the required file, imsmanifest.xml.
Resources.Translation: V paketu manjka zahtevana datoteka imsmanifest.xml.

Resources.Source: The requested directory, {0}, can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevane mape {0} ni mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: The list cannot be modified.
Resources.Translation: Seznama ni mogoče spreminjati.

Resources.Source: Undefined navigation request.
Resources.Translation: Nedefinirana zahteva za krmarjenje.

Resources.Source: The current activty is already terminated.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost je že zaustavljena.

Resources.Source: Target activity does not exist.
Resources.Translation: Ciljna dejavnost ne obstaja.

Resources.Source: Choice Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja izbire.

Resources.Source: The RenderContext.RelativePath must have a value.
Resources.Translation: RenderContext.RelativePath mora imeti vrednost.

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. The Index.xml or imsmanifest.xml file cannot be found.
Resources.Translation: Pri pridobivanju datoteke iz paketa je prišlo do napake. Datoteke Index.xml ali imsmanifest.xml file ni mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: An item with the identifier '{0}' already exists in this list.
Resources.Translation: Element z identifikatorjem »{0}« na tem seznamu že obstaja.

Resources.Source: The requested file was not found in the package.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevane datoteke ni bilo mogoče najti v paketu.

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that was out of range according to the SCORM 2004 specifications.
Resources.Translation: Elementu podatkovnega modela »0« je bila posredovana vrednost, ki je bila glede na specifikacije SCORM 2004 izven obsega.

Resources.Source: Continue
Resources.Translation: Continue

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. Unable to determine the file format.
Resources.Translation: Pri pridobivanju datoteke iz paketa je prišlo do napake. Oblike datoteke ni bilo mogoče ugotoviti.

Resources.Source: Navigation resulted in making '{0}' the current active activity.
Resources.Translation: Krmarjenje se je končalo tako, da je »{0}« postala trenutno aktivna dejavnost.

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. A file with multiple Learning Resources is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Pri pridobivanju datoteke iz paketa je prišlo do napake. Datoteka z več učnimi viri ni podprta.

Resources.Source: Sequencing cannot proceed because the required objective '{0}' was not found.
Resources.Translation: Sekvencioniranja ni mogoče nadaljevati, ker zahtevanega cilja {0} ni bilo mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that was out of range according to the SCORM 1.2 specifications.
Resources.Translation: Elementu podatkovnega modela »0« je bila posredovana vrednost, ki je bila glede na specifikacije SCORM 1.2 izven obsega.

Resources.Source: This LearningDataModel object may not be written to.
Resources.Translation: V ta predmet LearningDataModel ni mogoče pisati.

Resources.Source: Unsupported type '{0}' added to extension data.
Resources.Translation: V podatke razširitve je bil dodan nepodprt tip »{0}«.

Resources.Source: Rollup setting normalized measure to {0} for activity '{1}'.
Resources.Translation: Zbiranje nastavlja normalizirano meritev na {0} za dejavnost »{1}«.

Resources.Source: The relativePath value '{0}' does not represent a valid, package-relative path.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost relativePath »{0}« ne predstavlja veljavne poti, ki je relativna glede na paket.

Resources.Source: Cannot copy to '{0}' because a file or directory with the same name already exists. This operation can only copy to a destination that does not yet exist. It will create the destination directory.
Resources.Translation: Na mesto »{0}« ni mogoče kopirati, ker datoteka ali mapa s tem imenom že obstaja. S to operacijo je mogoče samo kopiranje na cilj, ki še ne obstaja. Postopek bo ustvaril ciljno mapo.

Resources.Source: Navigation complete. No current activity.
Resources.Translation: Krmarjenje je dokončano. Ni trenutne dejavnosti.

Resources.Source: Sequencing Exit rule requires that activity '{0}' terminate.
Resources.Translation: Pravilo za izhod iz sekvencioniranja zahteva, da se dejavnost »{0}« zaustavi.

Resources.Source: No item with the identifier '{0}' was found in this list.
Resources.Translation: Na seznamu ni bilo mogoče najti elementa z identifikatorjem »{0}«.

Resources.Source: Error code: {0}
Resources.Translation: Koda napake: {0}

Resources.Source: A CurrentActivity is required to exist before requesting this operation.
Resources.Translation: CurrentActivity mora obstajati pred oddajo zahteve za to operacijo.

Resources.Source: The object is not in the correct NameTable.
Resources.Translation: Predmet ni v pravilni tabeli imen NameTable.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja poteka.

Resources.Source: The current activity is active or suspended.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost je aktivna ali začasno zaustavljena.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost ni definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se ni začela.

Resources.Source: Undefined sequencing request.
Resources.Translation: Nedefinirana zahteva za sekvencioniranje.

Resources.Source: The current activity has not been terminated.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost ni bila zaustavljena.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost ni definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se ni začela.

Resources.Source: Previous
Resources.Translation: Previous

Resources.Source: The Current activity already terminated.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost je že zaustavljena.

Resources.Source: Cannot suspend an inactive root.
Resources.Translation: Neaktivnega korena ni mogoče začasno zaustaviti.

Resources.Source: A Current Activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost ni definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se ni začela.

Resources.Source: Nothing to abandon; no active activities.
Resources.Translation: Ničesar ni mogoče opustiti; ni aktivnih dejavnosti.

Resources.Source: Undefined termination request.
Resources.Translation: Nedefinirana zahteva za zaustavitev.

Resources.Source: Activity tree root has no parent.
Resources.Translation: Koren drevesa dejavnosti nima nadrejenega elementa.

Resources.Source: Nothing to suspend; no active activities.
Resources.Translation: Ničesar ni mogoče začasno zaustaviti; ni aktivnih dejavnosti.

Resources.Source: A current activity is defined. The sequencing session already begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost je definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se je že začela.

Resources.Source: No Suspended Activity defined.
Resources.Translation: Definirana ni nobena začasno zaustavljena dejavnost.

Resources.Source: A current activity is defined. The sequencing session already begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost je definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se je že začela.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja poteka.

Resources.Source: Activity unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Dejavnost ni na voljo.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost ni definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se ni začela.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja poteka.

Resources.Source: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja samo posredovanja.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nobena dejavnost ni »prejšnja« korenu.

Resources.Source: Forward Traversal Blocked.
Resources.Translation: Prečkanje posredovanja je blokirano.

Resources.Source: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja samo posredovanja.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nobena dejavnost ni »prejšnja« korenu.

Resources.Source: Cluster has no available children.
Resources.Translation: Gruča nima razpoložljivih podrejenih elementov.

Resources.Source: Last activity in the tree.
Resources.Translation: Zadnja dejavnost v drevesu.

Resources.Source: Choice request prevented by Flow-only activity.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevo izbire je preprečila dejavnost samo za potek.

Resources.Source: Unable to choose target activity - constrained choice.
Resources.Translation: Ciljne dejavnosti ni mogoče izbrati – omejena izbira.

Resources.Source: Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev pri izbiri izhoda iz nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja.

Resources.Source: Unable to activate target; target is not a child of the Current Activity.
Resources.Translation: Cilja ni mogoče aktivirati, ker ni podrejen element trenutne dejavnosti.

Resources.Source: No activities to consider.
Resources.Translation: Ni dejavnosti za pregled.

Resources.Source: Choice Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja izbire.

Resources.Source: Target activity hidden from choice.
Resources.Translation: Ciljne dejavnosti ni mogoče izbrati, ker je skrita.

Resources.Source: Target activity does not exist or is unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Ciljna dejavnost ne obstaja ali pa ni na voljo.

Resources.Source: No target for Choice.
Resources.Translation: Ni cilja, ki bi ga bilo mogoče izbrati.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Kršitev nadzornega načina sekvencioniranja poteka.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna dejavnost ni definirana. Seja sekvencioniranja se ni začela.

Resources.Source: Activity unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Dejavnost ni na voljo.

Resources.Source: Nothing to deliver.
Resources.Translation: Ničesar za dostavo.

Resources.Source: Cannot deliver a non-leaf activity.
Resources.Translation: Dejavnosti, ki ni list, ni mogoče dostaviti.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to abandon the current session. Only an active or suspended session may be abandoned, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Opustitev trenutne seje ni veljavna. Mogoča je samo opustitev aktivne seje, in to samo v pogledu Execute.

Resources.Source: The requested manifest file cannot be rendered.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevane datoteke manifesta ni mogoče upodobiti.

Resources.Source: The log parameter can not be null when the ValidationBehavior requires a log.
Resources.Translation: Dnevniški parameter ne more imeti ničelne vrednosti, ko ValidationBehavior zahteva dnevnik.

Resources.Source: (element has been removed)
Resources.Translation: (element je bil odstranjen)

Resources.Source: The referenced resource or organization can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Sklicevanega vira ali organizacije ni mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: The <ruleCondition> node must have a condition attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <ruleCondition> mora imeti atribut pogoja. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, {1}, is longer than that supported by MLC. It has been truncated to {2} characters.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost v vozlišču {1}, ki se začne z »{0}«, je daljša od vrednosti, ki jo podpira MLC. Prirezana je bila na {2} znakov.

Resources.Source: The value is out of range.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost je izven obsega.

Resources.Source: A <presentation> node may only appear, if needed, as a child of a leaf <item>element that references a resource.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <presentation> je lahko prikazano, če je to potrebno, samo kot podrejen element elementa <item>, ki se sklicuje na vir.

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of element <{1}> is an invalid value. Extra information: {2}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost »{0}« elementa <{1}> je neveljavna. Dodatne informacije: {2}

Resources.Source: A valid index.xml begins with a <LearningResource> node in the "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:learning-resource" namespace.
Resources.Translation: Veljavna datoteka index.xml se začne z vozliščem <LearningResource> v imenskem prostoru »urn:schemas-microsoft-com:learning-resource«.

Resources.Source: The resource node is missing the required attribute, 'href'
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče vira nima zahtevanega atributa »href«

Resources.Source: The <metadata> node is missing or in the wrong namespace on the <manifest>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišča <metadata> ni mogoče najti ali pa je v napačnem imenskem prostoru elementa <manifest>. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.2.

Resources.Source: The required attribute, {0}, is missing on element <{1}>. Extra information:{2}
Resources.Translation: Zahtevan atribut {0} manjka v elementu <{1}>. Dodatne informacije:{2}

Resources.Source: The value is outside the valid range [-1 to 1].
Resources.Translation: Vrednost je izven veljavnega obsega [-1 do 1].

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, {1}, is longer than that supported by Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost v vozlišču {1}, ki se začne z »{0}«, je daljša od vrednosti, ki jo podpirajo Microsoftove komponente za učenje.

Resources.Source: The name of the erroneous node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Ime vozlišča z napako je: {0}

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of element <{1}> is an invalid value. It has been replaced by the default value "{2}". Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost »{0}« elementa <{1}> je neveljavna. Zamenjana je bila s privzeto vrednostjo »{2}«. Dodatne informacije: {3}

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> can not be found in the correct namespace. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Vozlišča <{0}> ni bilo mogoče najti v pravilnem imenskem prostoru. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The value is an invalid URI.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost je neveljaven URI.

Resources.Source: A default value of "{0}" has been used in place of the missing or erroneous value for the <{1}> element's "{2}" attribute.
Resources.Translation: Namesto manjkajoče ali napačne vrednosti atributa »{2}« elementa <{1}> je bila uporabljena privzeta vrednost »{0}«.

Resources.Source: The value is an invalid xml:base. xml:base must be a valid URI that does not begin with a "/" but does end with a "/".
Resources.Translation: Vrednost je neveljaven element xml:base. xml:base mora biti veljaven URI, ki se ne začne z »/«, ampak se z »/« konča.

Resources.Source: The referencedObjective attribute on the {0} node is whitespace only, which is invalid. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Atribut referencedObjective v vozlišču {0} je sestavljen samo iz presledkov, kar ni veljavno. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that starts with "{1}" that is too long.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <{0}> ima vrednost, ki se začne z »{1}« in je predolga.

Resources.Source: The full XML of the parent node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Celoten XML nadrejenega vozlišča je: {0}

Resources.Source: The value of the <{0}> element's "{1}" attribute is missing or erroneous.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost atributa »{1}« elementa <{0}> manjka ali je napačna.

Resources.Source: The <ruleAction> node may occur 1 and only 1 time within a <preConditionRule>, <postConditionRule>, or <exitConditionRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <ruleAction> se lahko pojavi enkrat in samo enkrat znotraj elementa <preConditionRule>, <postConditionRule> ali <exitConditionRule>. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.2.

Resources.Source: The parent node is {0}.
Resources.Translation: Nadrejeno vozlišče je {0}.

Resources.Source: The <rollupCondition> node can only appear once in the <rollupRule> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <rollupCondition> se lahko v vozlišču <rollupRule> pojavi samo enkrat. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that is too long. It has been truncated to "{1}".
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <{0}> ima predolgo vrednost. Prirezana je bila na »{1}«.

Resources.Source: The parent node, {0}, must represent a SCO.
Resources.Translation: Nadrejeno vozlišče {0} mora predstavljati SCO.

Resources.Source: The value is not one of the permitted token values.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost ni dovoljena vrednost žetona.

Resources.Source: The full XML of the erroneous node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Celoten XML vozlišča z napako je: {0}

Resources.Source: The file, {0}, referenced by the location element inside of metadata in the manifest can not be found in the package.
Resources.Translation: Datoteke {0}, na katero se sklicuje element mesta znotraj metapodatkov manifesta, ni mogoče najti v paketu.

Resources.Source: The package is a multiple learning resource package, which is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Paket vsebuje več učnih virov, kar ni podprto.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> can not be found in the correct namespace An attempt will be made to find a child node with that name in other namespaces. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Vozlišča <{0}> ni mogoče najti v pravilnem imenskem prostoru Izveden bo poskus iskanja podrejenega vozlišča s tem imenom v drugih imenskih prostorih. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The <rollupAction> node can only appear once in the <rollupRule>node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <rollupAction> se lahko v vozlišču <rollupRule> pojavi samo enkrat. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.

Resources.Source: The value is not the expected type.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost ni pričakovanega tipa.

Resources.Source: The value of the <{0}> element is missing or erroneous.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost elementa <{0}> manjka ali je napačna.

Resources.Source: The value of the PageID attribute of the {0} element is invalid. The element has been omitted from the conversion.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost atributa PageID elementa {0} ni veljavna. Element je bil izvzet iz pretvorbe.

Resources.Source: The file {0} is not a valid file type.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka {0} ni veljavnega tipa.

Resources.Source: An element, <{0}>, is invalid because it is illegal or has illegal attribute values. Extra information: {1}
Resources.Translation: Element <{0}> ni veljaven, ker ni dovoljen ali pa ima vrednosti atributov, ki niso dovoljene. Dodatne informacije: {1}

Resources.Source: The "{0}" portion of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}> contains invalid URI characters. These have been converted into valid characters automatically. The new value is "{3}". Extra information: {4}.
Resources.Translation: Del »{0}« atributa {1} v elementu <{2}> vsebuje neveljavne znake URI-ja. Ti so bili samodejno pretvorjeni v veljavne znake. Nova vrednost je »{3}«. Dodatne informacije: {4}.

Resources.Source: The <title> node is required on the {0} node in Content Aggregation manifests. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.10, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <title> je zahtevano v vozlišču {0} manifestov za združevanje vsebine. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.10 ali SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.1.

Resources.Source: Remote content is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Oddaljena vsebina ni podprta.

Resources.Source: This learning resource requires a license and licensed Learning Resources are not supported.
Resources.Translation: Ta učni vir zahteva licenco, licenčna sredstva za učenje pa niso podprta.

Resources.Source: The value of the <prerequisites> type attribute must be "aicc_script".
Resources.Translation: Vrednost atributa tipa <prerequisites> mora biti »aicc_script«.

Resources.Source: A default value of "{0}" has been used in place of the missing or erroneous value for the <{1}> element.
Resources.Translation: Namesto manjkajoče ali napačne vrednosti elementa <{1}> je bila uporabljena privzeta vrednost »{0}«.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that starts with "{1}" that is too long for the "{2}" attribute.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <{0}> ima vrednost, ki se začne z »{1}« in je predolga za atribut »{2}«.

Resources.Source: The <item> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <item> mora imeti atribut identifikatorja. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9 ali SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.

Resources.Source: An Activity node is required for content used in Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Za vsebino, ki se uporablja v Microsoftovih komponentah za učenje, je zahtevano vozlišče »Activity«.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, <{1}>, is longer than the smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost v vozlišču {1}, ki se začne z »{0}«, je daljša od najmanjše dovoljene največje vrednosti (SPM), {2}.

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}>, is an invalid value. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost »{0}« atributa {1} v elementu <{1}> je neveljavna. Dodatne informacije: {3}

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}>, is an invalid value. It has been replaced by the default value "{3}". Extra information: {4}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost »{0}« atributa {1} v elementu <{1}> je neveljavna. Zamenjana je bila s privzeto vrednostjo »{3}«. Dodatne informacije: {4}

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than that supported by Microsoft Learning Components. Extra information: {2}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost atributa {1}, ki se začne z »{0}«, je daljša od vrednosti, ki jo podpirajo Microsoftove komponente za učenje. Dodatne informacije: {2}

Resources.Source: A <manifest> node in the correct namespace is required.
Resources.Translation: Zahtevano je vozlišče <manifest> v pravilnem imenskem prostoru.

Resources.Source: A manifest is required and is not present in the package.
Resources.Translation: Manifest je zahtevan in ni v paketu.

Resources.Source: The value of the PageID attribute, {0}, on a <Page> element is used more than once. PageID's must be unique for each <Page> element.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost {0} atributa PageID v elementu <Page> je uporabljen več kot enkrat. Atributi PageID morajo biti enolični za vsak element <Page>.

Resources.Source: The <resource> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.21, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <resource> mora imeti atribut identifikatorja. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.21, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that is too long for the "{1}" attribute. It has been truncated to "{2}".
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <{0}> ima vrednost, ki je predolga za atribut »{1}«. Prirezana je bila na »{2}«.

Resources.Source: (empty string)
Resources.Translation: (prazen niz)

Resources.Source: In multiple <mapInfo> nodes, true values are restricted. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.2.
Resources.Translation: V večkratnih vozliščih <mapInfo> so resnične vrednosti omejene. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.2.

Resources.Source: The referenced node can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Sklicevanega vozlišča ni mogoče najti.

Resources.Source: The value must be 0 or a positive integer.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost mora biti 0 ali pozitivno celo število.

Resources.Source: A resource that belongs to an activity must have a type attribute set to "webcontent", an adlcp:scormType attribute set to "sco" or "asset", and a valid href attribute. {0}
Resources.Translation: Vir, ki pripada dejavnosti, mora imeti atribut tipa nastavljen na »webcontent«, atribut adlcp:scormType nastavljen na »sco« ali »asset«, imeti pa mora tudi veljaven atribut href. {0}

Resources.Source: If an <item> element is a parent element, the <item> may not reference a <resource>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9. The full XML of the node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Če je element <item> nadrejen, se <item> ne sme sklicevati na element <resource>. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9. Celoten XML vozlišča je: {0}

Resources.Source: The <rollupCondition> node must have a condition attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <rollupCondition> mora imeti atribut pogoja. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.2.

Resources.Source: The <ruleConditions> node can only appear once in the <{0}> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <ruleConditions> se lahko v vozlišču <{0}> pojavi samo enkrat. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.

Resources.Source: In a list of <objectives>, there must be one and only one <primaryObjective> node.
Resources.Translation: Na seznamu elementov <objectives> mora biti eno in samo eno vozlišče <primaryObjective>.

Resources.Source: There are multiple instances of element, <{0}>. All but the first are ignored. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Obstaja več primerkov elementa <{0}>. Prezrti bodo vsi razen prvega. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The identifier is not a valid xs:ID.
Resources.Translation: Identifikator ni veljaven element xs:ID.

Resources.Source: The <minNormalizedMeasure> node can only appear once in the <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <minNormalizedMeasure> se lahko v vozlišču <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> pojavi samo enkrat. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.

Resources.Source: An Organization node is required for content used in Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Za vsebino, ki se uporablja v Microsoftovih komponentah za učenje, je zahtevano vozlišče »Organization«.

Resources.Source: The duplicate nodes share the same {0} value, "{1}". The values must be different.
Resources.Translation: Podvojena vozlišča imajo enako vrednost »{1}« za {0}. Vrednosti morajo biti različne.

Resources.Source: This package could not be opened. More information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Paketa ni bilo mogoče odpreti. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: The package contains a manifest that contains badly formed XML.
Resources.Translation: Paket vsebuje manifest, ki vsebuje slabo oblikovan XML.

Resources.Source: The objective must have an objectiveID attribute. Extra information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Namen mora imeti atribut objectiveID. Dodatne informacije: {0}

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than that supported by for content used in Microsoft Learning Components. It has been truncated to {2} characters. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost atributa {1}, ki se začne z »{0}«, je daljša od vrednosti, ki so podprte za Microsoftove komponente za učenje. Prirezana je bila na {2} znakov. Dodatne informacije: {3}

Resources.Source: There are problems with the syntax of the prerequisite script, or a referenced identifier can not be found in the manifest.
Resources.Translation: Prišlo je do težav s sintakso zahtevanega skripta ali pa sklicevanega identifikatorja ni mogoče najti v manifestu.

Resources.Source: The <organization> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.7, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <organization> mora imeti atribut identifikatorja. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.7, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.

Resources.Source: The file, {0}, referenced by the location element inside of metadata in the manifest contains invalid metadata.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka {0}, na katero se sklicuje element mesta znotraj metapodatkov v manifestu, vsebuje neveljavne metapodatke.

Resources.Source: The value is out of range [-1 to 1] on the <minNormalizedMeasure> node in the <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost vozlišča <minNormalizedMeasure> v vozlišču <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> je zunaj obsega [-1 to 1]. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.

Resources.Source: The <rollupAction> node is missing on an <rollupRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <rollupAction> za element <rollupRule> manjka. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.

Resources.Source: The <sequencing> node in a <sequencingCollection> must have an ID attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <sequencing> v elementu <sequencingCollection> mora imeti atribut ID. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.1.

Resources.Source: Unable to substitute a default value for the missing value of node <{0}> because the conversion process is not allowed to substitute default values for missing or erroneous values in the index.xml.
Resources.Translation: Manjkajoče vrednosti vozlišča <{0}> ni bilo mogoče nadomestiti s privzeto vrednostjo, ker postopku pretvorbe ni dovoljeno zamenjevati privzetih vrednosti z manjkajočimi ali napačnimi vrednostmi v datoteki index.xml.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than the smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Vrednost atributa {1}, ki se začne z »{0}«, je daljša od najmanjše dovoljene največje vrednosti (SPM) – {2}. Extra information: {3}

Resources.Source: The required element, <{0}>, is missing. Default values will be used. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Zahtevan element <{0}> manjka. Uporabljene bodo privzete vrednosti. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The file {0} does not exist.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka {0} ne obstaja.

Resources.Source: The attribute, {1}, containing the value "{0}" on node <{2}> is illegal in Resource packages.
Resources.Translation: Atribut {1} v vozlišču <{2}>, ki vsebuje vrednost »{0}«, je v paketu virov neveljaven.

Resources.Source: The value must be a decimal value from 0 to 1, inclusive.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost mora biti decimalna vrednost med 0 in 1, vključno s tema vrednostma.

Resources.Source: The <rollupConditions> node is missing on an <rollupRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <rollupConditions> za element <rollupRule> manjka. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.

Resources.Source: <sequencingCollection> nodes are not permitted in resource packages. This manifest is considered a resource package because it has no <organization> nodes. See SCORM CAM 3.5.3.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišča <sequencingCollection> v paketih virov niso dovoljena. Ta manifest se obravnava kot paket virov, ker nima vozlišč <organization>. Oglejte si SCORM CAM 3.5.3.

Resources.Source: The <file> node must have an href attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.23, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.3.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <file> mora imeti atribut href. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.23, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.3.

Resources.Source: The <title> node is missing on the <organization> node with identifier="{0}". See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.8, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vozlišče <title> manjka v vozlišču <organization> z identifikatorjem »{0}«. Oglejte si SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.8, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.1.

Resources.Source: UA !There are multiple instances of element, <{0}>. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: UA !Obstaja več primerkov elementa <{0}>. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The "{0}" value of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}> contains spaces, which are invalid URI characters. This URI is still being allowed, but the package may not work as expected.
Resources.Translation: Vrednost »{0}« atributa {1} v elementu <{2}> vsebuje presledke, ki so neveljavni znaki URI-ja. URI je še vedno dovoljen, vendar pa paket morda ne bo deloval po pričakovanjih.

Resources.Source: The file {0} is not referenced in the manifest.
Resources.Translation: V manifestu ni sklicev na datoteko {0}.

Resources.Source: The required element, <{0}>, is missing. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Zahtevan element <{0}> manjka. Dodatne informacije:{1}
